detail_desc: Windbreaker in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening, taped zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and narrow trims at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly shorter top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a rounded, raw-edge hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with frills at the top, an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Sleeveless, A-line dress in patterned tulle with appliqués in a narrow cut at the top. Small plastic sparkly stones around the front of the neckline and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide ribbed cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Boxy-style, cable-knit polo-neck jumper in soft, warming yak wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Glittery, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot at the top.

Sleeveless long dress in chiffon crêpe with decorative gathers around the neckline and a V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, gathered skirt. Lined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Fake fly and button and slim legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Sports jacket in jersey with a zip down the front and a lined hood with elastic drawstrings. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, zipped chest pockets with taped details and welt side pockets. Elastication at the back of the hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Tops in organic cotton jersey, one block-coloured and one in a solid colour. Both tops have gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Triangular scarves in soft jersey with terry on the inside and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and elasticated hems. Slim Fit.
Short, rib-knit cardigan with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short cap sleeves and elastication at the back of the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with a frilled collar, buttons down the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and a yoke at the back. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Fully lined V-neck swimsuit with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and rounded hem.
Top in jersey with a soft, brushed finish. Boat neck with a ribbed trim around the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short dress in an airy patterned weave with a small stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck, an elasticated waist and long sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic rhinestones.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves, smocking a the waist and a softly draping, gathered skirt. Unlined.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps with D-rings, a padded back plate and side pockets, one in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Top in sturdy satin with a round neck, visible zip at the top and inset patterned panels at the sides. Short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour with inset patterned sections.

Parka in a cotton weave with a faux-fur trimmed, pile-lined hood and high collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, a chest pocket with a button and patch front pockets with a flap. Buttoned cuffs and a single back vent with a drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in pile.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a lace yoke, buttons and gathers at the top and elasticated cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in softly draping satin with cap sleeves and a V-neck with a pleat. Narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a lace yoke at the top and a frill trim at the neckline and shoulders. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with elastication and frill trims. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal side pieces and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined jacket in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar with a drawstring, zip down the front, welt side pockets and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Short-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a double-layered, wrapover front for easier nursing access.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Jersey T-shirt.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, back pockets, fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.

Ankle-length trousers in a sturdy weave made from Tencel™ lyocell and recycled polyester. High waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Closer fit at the top and shaped, tapered legs with creases. Diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Waist bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable waist strap, a zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x14x25 cm.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid for bright white results even at low temperatures. Designed to magic away stains too with the help of enzymes. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Ankle-length pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastic at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Tapered fit.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Long, multi-strand metal necklace decorated with beads made of reconstituted stone and metal pendants. Adjustable length 57-65 cm.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, loose, chunky knit with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Fitted, smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a small, overlocked frill trim at the top and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave containing some linen with elastication and smocking around the top and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Short, boxy jacket in cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, and an opening with a button at the cuffs.
Ankle-length twill trousers with a regular waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Short satin dressing gown with a lace yoke and short, wide sleeves with lace trims. Concealed ties and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Single-breasted jacket in a slightly stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
